response.overview: FINAL FANTASY VII is a timeless classic, originally released in 1997 and boasting over 11 million units sold worldwide. Utilizing cutting-edge technology that defined an era, FINAL FANTASY VII featured an epic, emotional story and a cast of captivating characters that captured the hearts of fans everywhere.  Now, we are pleased to bring you a “revival” soundtrack to enjoy both the sounds and in-game footage of the beloved FINAL FANTASY VII!  This album contains all 85 songs composed by Nobuo Uematsu, the composer of hundreds of songs throughout the FINAL FANTASY series. In the enclosed booklet, you will find special comments from the developers of the original game. We have carefully selected gameplay footage and visual presentations out of countless memorable scenes, and packed it in to one Blu-ray Disc for you to enjoy.  Let Cloud, Aerith, Sephiroth, and the rest of the crew bring back fond memories from back in the day.
response.title: Final Fantasy VII OST Revival
